author: wmtan
body: There are two separate caches used by PoolSource for reading events in input files.   The secondary one, called the trigger cache, is used only in unusual circumstances.  However, in the multithreaded environment, having the trigger cache enabled can cause occasional fatal asserts due to a yet undiscovered bug in its implementation.  Since there is doubt that the trigger cache is useful in a multithreaded environment, this pull request simply disables it for now. This eliminates the asserts.
title: Disable the triggerCache in the multithreaded environment.
